name: Microsoft Teams Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Microsoft Teams subagent capabilities including messaging, channel management, team operations, and meetings. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.input: send message to General channel in Marketing team
items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find Marketing team. 3. Find General channel. 4. Post message to channel.
items.context: User wants to send channel message

items.expected_output: List all Microsoft Teams accessible by user.
Create new team with display name 'Project Alpha'.
1. List teams. 2. Find Engineering team. 3. List channels for that team.
1. List teams. 2. Find DevOps team. 3. Create channel named 'backend'.

items.input: send chat message to john about the deadline
items.expected_output: 1. List users. 2. Find john. 3. Create/find one-on-one chat. 4. Send message about deadline.
Get all chats for authenticated user.
Search Teams messages with KQL query for 'quarterly report'.
items.context: User wants to search message history

items.input: schedule teams meeting for tomorrow at 3pm
items.expected_output: Create online meeting with start time set to tomorrow 3pm.
1. List teams. 2. Find Engineering team. 3. List users. 4. Find sarah. 5. Add member to team.
items.context: User wants to add team member

items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find Sales team. 3. List team members.
items.context: User wants to see team members

items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find old-project team. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Archive team.
items.context: User wants to archive team - needs consent

items.input: get messages from #general in Product team
items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find Product team. 3. Find General channel. 4. List channel messages.
items.context: User wants to read channel history

items.input: reply to the message about deployment
items.expected_output: 1. Search messages about deployment. 2. Get message details. 3. Reply to the message.
items.context: User wants to reply to message

items.input: search files in teams for 'budget spreadsheet'
items.expected_output: Search files with KQL query for 'budget spreadsheet'.

items.input: update team name from ProjectX to Project-X
items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find ProjectX team. 3. Update team with new display name.
List all users in the organization directory.
items.context: User wants to see org members

items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find Marketing team. 3. Get team details.

items.input: create group chat with john and sarah about project
items.expected_output: 1. List users. 2. Find john and sarah. 3. Create group chat with those members.
1. Recognize 'teeams' as typo for 'teams'. 2. Ask for clarification on which channel/team.
1. List teams. 2. Find team matching 'old'. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete team.
items.context: User wants to delete team - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. List teams. 2. Find Support team. 3. Unarchive team.
items.context: User wants to restore archived team

items.input: get replies to the announcement message
items.expected_output: 1. Search messages for announcement. 2. Get message ID. 3. List message replies.
items.context: User wants to see thread replies

items.input: update message in chat to fix typo
items.expected_output: 1. Get recent chat messages. 2. Find message with typo. 3. Update chat message.
items.context: User wants to edit sent message

items.expected_output: List people relevant to authenticated user (org graph).
